title: Gu-pan!
sinopse: A slice of life 4-koma revolving around three 2nd year highshool students - Miri Washizu, Natsumi Mameda, and Utako Nagao. Miri is of small stature but commonly misunderstood for being violent because of the mean expression on her face. Natsumi's main goal is to make life hard for Miri. Utako is class president and often looks after Miri.
